channel.title: [PI] Mage Points

item.title: [PI] Mage Points
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

I know Mage Points are usually already in PI Bases, but my Mage points wont work, ive tried to figure it out, and i put a sendMessage in also to see if would at least get that.

The code below is in the DropItems Void, in the npchandler class.

public void dropItems(int i) { int npc = 0; //long start = System.currentTimeMillis(); Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy]; if(c != null) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 912 || npcs[i].npcType == 913 || npcs[i].npcType == 914) c.magePoints += 1; c.sendMessage("Testing"); if (NPCDrops.constantDrops.get(npcs[i].npcType) != null) { for (int item : NPCDrops.constantDrops.get(npcs[i].npcType)) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, item, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); } }

Any ideas, i dont need the exact answer but maybe point me in the right direction?

Read full topic
